comment.author: 82862615@N00
comment._content: Wikipedia says that Gil Anderson ranked 16th (but did not finish) in the 1912 Indianapolis 500 when his Stutz race car (pictured above) crashed on turn three. Reference: Wikipedia: 1912 Indianapolis 500

comment.author: 83551186@N00
comment._content: I looked at that Wikipedia article, and it said that the fastest car went 88 mph.  Can you imagine going 88 in one of these cars?
